org.jconverter.converter

Interface Converter<T,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the source type.
    V - the target type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayToArrayConverter, ArrayToCollectionConverter, ArrayToEnumerationConverter, ArrayToIterableConverter, ArrayToIteratorConverter, ArrayToMapConverter, CalendarToNumberConverter, EnumerationToArrayConverter, EnumerationToCollectionConverter, EnumerationToEnumerationConverter, EnumerationToIterableConverter, EnumerationToIteratorConverter, EnumerationToMapConverter, IterableToArrayConverter, IterableToCollectionConverter, IterableToEnumerationConverter, IterableToIterableConverter, IterableToIteratorConverter, IterableToMapConverter, IteratorToArrayConverter, IteratorToCollectionConverter, IteratorToEnumerationConverter, IteratorToIterableConverter, IteratorToIteratorConverter, IteratorToMapConverter, JGumConverter, MapToArrayConverter, MapToCollectionConverter, MapToEnumerationConverter, MapToIterableConverter, MapToIteratorConverter, MapToMapConverter, NumberToBooleanConverter, NumberToCalendarConverter, NumberToGregorianCalendarConverter, NumberToNumberConverter, NumberToXMLGregorianCalendarConverter, ObjectToStringConverter, StringToBooleanConverter, StringToCalendarConverter, StringToCharacterConverter, StringToDateConverter, StringToGregorianCalendarConverter, StringToNumberConverter, StringToXMLGregorianCalendarConverter, TypedConverter, TypedConverterProxy

    public interface Converter<T,V>
    Interface implemented by all the JConverter converters.
    Author:
    sergioc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V apply(T source, Type targetType, JConverter context) 

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        V apply(T source,
      Type targetType,
      JConverter context)
        Parameters:
        source - the object to convert.
        targetType - the target type.
        context - the context.
        Returns:
        the source type converted to the target type according to the given context.
